title: Ruling on Homeopathic Medicines in Islam - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Hamner says are we allowed to take homeopathic medicines since they contain alcohol homeopathic medicines that is widely spreading nowadays if it contains small percentage of alcohol that would not intoxicate you and that is used to preserve some of them substances and minerals used in our ingredients used in preparing the medication if these two conditions are there then there's no problem in doing it however homeopathic medication usually contains 40 or 50 percent alcohol and this intoxicate this wastes you and hence this is not permissible and there are other alternatives for you to use and allah azzawajal knows best
